required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multi-center Observational Study on the Progression of Atherosclerotic Plaques in Anti-PD-1 mAb Treated Tumor Patients by Artery Ultrasound Follow-up
clinical_study.official_title: Multi-center Observational Study on the Progression of Atherosclerotic Plaques in Anti-PD-1 mAb Treated Tumor Patients by Artery Ultrasound Follow-up

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

collaborator.agency: The Affiliated Tumor Hospital of Nantong University, Nantong, Jiangsu Province, China

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: Multi-center Observational Study on the Progression of Atherosclerotic Plaques in Anti-PD-1 mAb Treated Tumor Patients by Artery Ultrasound Follow-up

detailed_description.textblock: This is a self-control, multi-center observational study. This study aims to evaluate the effectiveness of anti-PD-1 mAbs on atherosclerotic plaques in those anti-PD-1 mAbs treated patients. The method for quantification and evaluation of atherosclerotic plaques are based on the calculation of the plaque area of atherosclerotic plaques on the long axis direction of artery on the ultrasound images. By comparing the plaque areas at the same location of artery in each patient before and after anti-PD-1 mAbs treatments, to assess the progression of atherosclerotic plaques response to anti-PD-1 mAbs.

primary_outcome.measure: Sizes of plaque areas at the same locations on artery ultrasound
primary_outcome.time_frame: at least of 3 months after the first dosage of anti-PD-1 mAbs
primary_outcome.description: Comparison of the sizes of plaque areas at the same locations on artery ultrasound before and after anti-PD-1 mAbs treatments.

intervention.description: dosage form: intravenous injection; frequency: 2-3 weeks; duration: at least 3 months

study_pop.textblock: Study population are the PD-1 inhibitor treated tumor patients from selected multi-center.

facility.name: 2nd Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine at Zhejiang University
